price: Sheyxaanonni eenyu irratti akka bu’an isinitti himuu?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
